name: Temple United Methodist Church
description: Temple UMC runs a food pantry every Wednesday
fullDescription: Temple UMC runs a food pantry every Wednesday
whatTheyOffer: Temple United Methodist Church is a diverse Christian community of people who are committed to Jesus Christ, to one another, and to offering God's healing love in San Francisco and throughout the world. Service is live-streamed on their YouTube channel @TUMCpeace at 10 AM on Sunday mornings.
